Name: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' out of all activity executions in the event log
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' out of all cases

Name: Number of times 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' occurs in the entire event log
Metric: Number of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' activities

Name: Percentage of process variants containing 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' relative to the total number of variants
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' compared to the frequency of 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION'
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Percentage of cases where 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' is immediately followed by 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING'
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' out of all 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Number of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' events that occur after a prior 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' without any intermediate approval step
Metric: Number of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' activities for cases where activity 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' occurs

Name: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' that lead to re-submission (i.e., followed later in the same case by 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE')
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' out of all 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Frequency of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' in variants that eventually reach 'Payment Handled', compared to those that do not
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' out of all 'Payment Handled'

Name: Ratio of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' to 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' across all cases
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Number of distinct cases containing at least one 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' event
Metric: Number of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' activities

Name: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' that appear in loops (i.e., repeated rejection-resubmission cycles within the same case)
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' out of all 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Frequency of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' in variants that skip the budget owner or pre-approver steps, as described in the process description
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' out of all cases where 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' does not happen

Name: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' occurring in domestic declaration reimbursement paths versus pre-approved travel paths
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' out of all cases

Name: Number of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' events with associated case amounts above 100 euros
Metric: Number of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' activities > 100 where ma is the last value of case:Amount

Name: Percentage of all rejections (including 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION', 'Declaration REJECTED by SUPERVISOR', etc.) that are specifically 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING'
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' out of all cases

Name: Average number of activities between 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' in rejecting variants
Metric: the average of the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' filtered by the function ma > 0 where ma is the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Percentage of process instances containing 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' that also contain 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' elsewhere in the trace
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Number of times 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' directly precedes another rejection activity in the same case
Metric: Number of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' activities

Name: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' occurrences in 2018 versus 2017 (inferred from case timestamps or case IDs if temporal data is embedded)
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' in cases that originate from departments active only in 2017 versus those active in 2018
Metric: Number of 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' activities
